      • move

        public void move​(PileType source,
                 int pileNumber,
                 int cardIndex,
                 PileType destination,
                 int destPileNumber)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: FreecellModel
        Move a card from the given source pile to the given destination pile, if the move is valid.
        Parameters:
        source - the type of the source pile see @link{PileType}
        pileNumber - the pile number of the given type, starting at 0
        cardIndex - the index of the card to be moved from the source pile, starting at 0
        destination - the type of the destination pile (see
        destPileNumber - the pile number of the given type, starting at 0
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the move is not possible PileType)
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a move is attempted before the game has starts

      • getCardsFromSourcePile

        protected java.util.List<Card> getCardsFromSourcePile​(PileType pileType,
                                                      int pileIndex,
                                                      int cardIndex)
                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the last card from the given pile of the given pile type.
        Parameters:
        pileType - determines from which pile type you want to get the last card from
        pileIndex - determines from which pile of a certain pile type you want to get the last card from.
        cardIndex - determines the index of the last (top most) in that particular pile of that particular type.
        Returns:
        the last card (top most) Card from the given pile
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the source pile is invalid or null or the given card index is not the last one in that particular pile of that particular type.

      • removeCardsFromPile

        protected void removeCardsFromPile​(PileType pileType,
                                   int pileIndex,
                                   int cardIndex)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes the last (top most) card from a given pile type at the given pile index.
        Parameters:
        pileType - determines from which pile type you want to remove the last card from
        pileIndex - determines from which pile of a certain pile type you want to remove the last card from.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the pile type provided is not cascade not open or the given pile index contains no cards

      • putCardsToDestinationPile

        protected boolean putCardsToDestinationPile​(java.util.List<Card> cards,
                                            PileType pileType,
                                            int pileIndex)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Puts a given card to a given pile of a given type if that move is possible according to the rules of the Freecell game.
        Parameters:
        cards - represents the card to be put on a provided destination pile
        pileType - determines to which pile type you want to put the given card
        pileIndex - determines to which pile of a certain pile type you want to put the given card to.
        Returns:
        true is it is possible to put a given card to a given destination
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the pile type is set to null or the move chosen is not valid according to the freecell rules
